It cost me $433 including tax at Best Buy (just a little bit $50 more than HX9v model,16x zoom) $50 more worth it for 30x zoom. I am uploading picture taken at 30x zoom under cloudy weather. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Good in Low Light; Nice Body Color; Good Image Stabilization; Great Zoom; Easy To Use; Large Clear LCD; Fast/accurate auto-focus
I bought this camera mostly for work (event lighting). The picture quality is really good with very low level light. It also did fairly well with the extreme color saturation from my lights, the recorded images were similar to what the eye would see. I have not yet tested this camera with LED sources. I have not learned how to change all of the settings to see what works the best, but the auto settings work well as is.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD; Natural color; Easy to Use; Great Zoom; Great Resolution
I use this mostly for wildlife and scenery photography as I hike or ride my horse. Friends think it a bit odd because it's not a compact camera, but, it takes such great, natural photographs that I'm more than willing to deal with the extra bulk. I LOVE this camera. The most I have to do to a photo when I get it on the computer is a little cropping. For this class of camera, there is no better lens than this Carl Zeiss. Did I say that I LOVE this camera?

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Everything as advertized and as promised
Item.Review: This is my 2nd Sony tele digital, the first was a DSC-H9 bought at a Sony store in 2007 which has a 15X lens. That one served me to this day and I am happy with every aspect of it. I now bought this much more advanced DSC-HX100V from B&H with unbelievable lower price. The service is fast and the product is wonderful. I am a very happy customer.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Small / Compact; Good Image Quality; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Nice Body Color; Large Clear LCD; Good Image Stabilization; Great Zoom
Cons: Short Battery Life
1.Intelligent auto uses a lot of battery. 2.Having a book of directions would be very helpful 3.to much "stuff" in the internal directions. 4.All the gps, 3D, and information in the camera is over kill. 4.The lens and zoom are wonderful. 5.It takes WONDERFUL pictures, is a point and shoot, has a good lens, zoom. It's better than the canon, panasconic point and shoot. 6. this is the third 100v I bought. The other two were defictive. I wouldn't have bought #3 if it didn't take such good pictures.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I recently shot 150 pictures at the Indian Wells tennis tournament and got great shots even at full zoom. Great image stability. Also got great night shots without using the flash. The panorama mode worked too. My only complaint is that it is a little slow to focus between shots, but certainly not a deal breaker. I replaced a Sony DSC H5, which I liked, but the new m odel does everything better!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: I really wanted to love it....
Item.Review:
Pros: Most everything
Cons: The color accuracy of outdoor scenes.
The camera is so impressive. I loved everything about it except the color accuracy. I was bothered by the pictures that I took, so I compared it side by side to a canon. The Canon pictures weren't as sharp, but the sky was blue as opposed to a flatter purple color on the Sony. Everything I took pictures of was just off color wise. I tried so many different settings, but in the end, returned the camera.... If the color accuracy isn't too important to you, it's really amazing....

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: 30X zoom works very well; Good Battery Life; Crisp clear pictures; Great Resolution; Easy to Use; Great Zoom; This camera is amazing; Videos are excellent; very easy to use
Cons: None yet
I bought this camera due to excellent reviews. We show horses. Videos with our Fugi were always choppy and out of focus. So far, every video with the sony have been crisp, clear and in focus. I was very surprised to see objects in the foreground and background remained in focus in the videos. The software that came with it works very well, but is necessary in order to download the videos. I see no reason to buy a DSLR.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Got a Camera with all features i looked!
Item.Review:
Pros: Good in Low Light; Easy to Use; Great Zoom; Fast Shutter Speed; Great Resolution; Good Battery Life; Large Clear LCD
We get good looking pictures with better image quality under any lighting situation ,However you may not be able to capture the Original Image quality.
If we are looking for High quality Video and good looking pictures .This is definitely a best option with lots of added features.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: No family should be without this camara
Item.Review:
Pros: Good in Low Light; Stereo sound rocks; Easy To Use; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Great Zoom; Large Clear LCD; Small / Compact; Good Image Quality
Cons: None
Bought this for my son, he loves it. He makes videos with his friends and loves to take pictures. This camara provides everything he wanted and needed. He has already done so much with this and is constantly trying new things. This camara has many options and he loves the versatility.He did extensive research on camaras before we purchased anything. We are both extremely satisfied with this SONY!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Price,, zoom, easy to use
Cons: I couldn't find anything wrong yet
Incredible low price for such a good camera. Excellent pictures quality, very easy to use, nice zoom, great focus, and 16.2 megapixels? what else can you ask for? I highly recommend this product for begginers, I used it already at night, sports, parties and snow, really great pictures, even those taken from far away look beautiful.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellent Camera with tons of features
Item.Review: This camera was a wise purchase! I wanted a camera that allowed me to take full control over my shooting experience but be easily switchable back to automatic for really complicated environments. I am by no means, professional but have dabbled in photography classes. This camera can challenge a novice, but is still simple enough for a beginner. By the way, the images are phenomenal! Best White balance and low light adjustments in its class. Also, Panoramic, 3D, and GPS are really fun features.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: everything!
Cons: price
I have a lot of digital cameras but that one is perfect for me.
It fully fits my needs. I have next requirements for a camera:
hi - zoom enough compact fast shuffle several shots per second price < 600
Also I wanted manual zoom/focus configuration as have DSLRs (That is why I have chosen this model. I selected between Nikon P500, Olimpus SP-800uz and Panasonic Lumix FZ35).
This camera have a lot of features and most of them is hidden from eyes. Automatic mode also provide amazing pictures.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Takes awesome pictures
Cons: Won't fit in my pocket
Absolutely love this camera. I'm still learning all the things it can do. It's easy to use with on-screen help and it takes awesome pictures. Only con is it's size. Won't fit in my pocket like my last camera would.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Features, quality of pictures, zoom
Cons: Somewhat large size.
I bought this for my high-school age daughter, who loves to take pictures and wanted something better than a pocket digital but wasn't ready for an SLR. She is tech savey and loves all of the features. She says it takes fantastic pictures, especially high quality HD, and it's really easy to use.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: This camera is wonderful...I have had so much fun using it. I really like the burst feature. It works really well to capture moving things that you would not capture with out it. The burst feature works really well at sporting events. The zoom is excellent and the images are very crisp. Best camera around for the price!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice Body Color; Powerful macro; Good in Low Light; Easy To Use; Good Image Stabilization; Great Zoom; Large Clear LCD; Amazing Video
Cons: Lack of filter threading; Movie onoff awkward; No printed manual
Didn't want to carry around extra lenses, etc. This offered enough features (great zoom and close macro) that it suits my needs. Needed something better than "point&shoot" but not a DSLR. I use this for nature scenes, macro, auto-racing, airshows and regular candids. It's a great compromise between DSLR and convenience of "point&shoot."

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use
Cons: nothing..5 stars
I bought this camera for myself as a birthday gift. As soon as the battery was charged I started to use it to shot pictures of the night sky and full moon. With no tripod the pictures were amazing. They were clear and just stunning. The camera is lightweight, easy to use and has very helpful features such as a built in manual so you don't need to search far for clarification. I shot some videoa at the ocean and it is very good quality.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Clear photos. Everything
Cons: Nothing that I can think of.
I have a Sony Cyber-shot F717, 5 mp that I will be taking into the shop for repair, but I also have 4 others that are 10mp, 12mp and 14mp. I bought this one last week and couldn't be happier. I was debating on the Sony NEX 5, but decided on this one since I didn't feel like switching lenses all the time. I took it to the car show and shot some pretty crisp pictures. It feels good in your hands. The zoom is AWESOME! If I didn't feel like walking to the other end of the parking lot to take a photo, I just zoomed in and shot it. Came out beautiful! Great camera and fun too!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I bought this a month back when it was running quickly out of stock. I literally ran around shops in my city to get my hands on this one,and it was WORTH the run. I love photography and i needed a P&S camera to work around b4 i bought an SLR and this was my choice. About the camera: Simply put- STUNNER. Many wonder if camera provides good quality low light images-YES. You can try using various manual shutter speeds and aperture settings to get images at low light too. One point i think cud have been improved is the battery life. they claim 410pics but i believe it wont quite hit that mark. I could make only nearly 200pics with almost more than 3/4th used.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great quality photos, good price
Cons: lack of written user manual
We really love the quality of the photos and video we get from the camera. Our only complaint is that the in camera help is not at all adequate and the lack of a written user manual makes the camera more difficult to use.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: More then a regular point and shoot
Item.Review: This is a fantastic camera! Much quicker at taking pictures then the traditional point and shoot, this Sony takes clear crisp shots. Love the panoramic in camera stitching and the HDR in camera merging. Great value for the money with a 30x zoom!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Im a musician & Hiphop artist & I was looking for a camera for HD video & also Hi-Res photos for album/Mixtape covers. I was look hard at the Canon 600d (because a 7D is currently out of my $ range) but decided to checkout some Super Zoom cameras as a possible less expensive option. After doing much research on the Canon SX30, Nikon P100, & Sony HX100v..I decided to go with the HX100v because it seemed to get the best reviews of the three & was out of stock from B&H. The photos from this camera are awesome! HD video is stunning..I would buy this camera again for sure! Great product & half the price of the 600d.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I've chosen this product to use it for every occasion, holidays, birthday, parties... I've shot 950 photos in NYC, Yellowstone, UTAH national parks, Grand Canyon and Las Vegas and I appreciated the zoom that allows me to capture animals not really close to me, as also some particular landscapes. Face and smile recognition works very well as also the reflex-effect to highlight only the closer subject(even if it must be at max 30 centimetres-1 foot). I appreciated also the setting for taking in picture water (lake, sea) as also the one for subject with the sun behind. I just had some problems to obtain photos with the real colors at sunset.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Sony's Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V is a Great camera
Item.Review: Great HD videos, unreal 30X zoom and it's very nice being able to take still shots during a video. I have not had time to really enjoy all the features yet but what I have used, very impressive! Would'nt you know it would go onsale $85 cheaper two weeks after I bought it.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellent Camera! Unbelievable fast action shots!
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything, Great fast action shots. Clear hand held full zoom pictures. In camera help guide. Very user friendly.
Cons: Nothing so far!
My old camera died and I purchased this one the day before my grandson was racing in the State Karting Championship. Not having any time to learn the camera I didn't expect to get any good shots, how wrong I was! Since the karts are going 65 mph and after my first shots missed the karts completely and ended up being of asphalt only, I browsed the in camera help and decided to try the burst feature set on auto, OMG the pictures are stunning. Perfectly in focus and the karts appear to be standing still! These were taken hand held at 3/4 to full zoom. The steady shot stabilization when at full zoom is remarkable. The clarity and colors ar ... e beautiful in every picture. My favorite picture was taken hand held at full zoom and it is of my son reaching over and touching my grandsons out streched hand as he was driving out of the grid onto the track. If it wasn't for this camera i would have missed this precious moment as the stands were so far away from the grid it couldn't be seen with the naked eye. My only regret is not getting a shot of him taking the checkered flag, but that not the cameras fault it was Grandma's for being so excited I forgot to take a picture. I had considered the Nikon 500P but where I read reviews that full zoom pictures were blurry I compared them in the store. I full zoomed into the far corner of the store white ceiling rafters and the Sony focused immediately and the picture was crystal clear, when I tried this with the Nikon it couldn't focus on the rafters at all. My decision was made at that instant, I was getting the Sony. I couldn't be happier. This camera does it all! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything
Cons: Nothing as of yet.
Just came back from Vacation in Hawaii and let me tell you this camera did not let me down. It's picture and video quality is the best I've seen in a point and shoot camera.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use, great image quality
Cons: It is a little larger than I had wanted
I love this camera! I can't stop saying it to anyone that I talk to. It has robust features, the image quality is stunning, it's not as bulky nor as heavy as an SLR. The zoom is incredible. It can be as simple to use as a pocket camera, while still allowing me to experiment with as many different modes are you can imagine using. This is my best Sony camera yet!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: This is a great travel camera; additionally, it is wonderful for holiday pictures. The pictures are crisp. At this point I am still learning all the features. My only problem has been some difficulty in downloading the Sony user manual.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I purchased the Cybershot as a replacement for my Lumix DMC FZ50. I was originally going to buy another Lumix but when it was demonstrated instore it did not feel anywhere near as sturdy so I then looked at several other brands. The Cybershot was on special and was recommended by the sales staff. I additionally purchased a 16GB SD card (Lexar speed 10) and a generic spare battery and battery charger. I have so far taken about 500 pictures but not worked out the optimum settings and have have both excellent and extremely poor results. It seems I may have to read the manual. As with the Lumix I recognise that poor lighting will often give horribly noisy pictures so attempt to ensure all shots are at ISO 100. Since most of my pictures are outdoors in Jamaica with 365 days of sunshine this is ... not too difficult. I have so far tried the A and i-CAM+ settings most and am reasonably happy with the resolution. I am using the camera at 10MB setting not the max of 16 MB. The 30 * zoom is incredible and for that reason I am persevering and trying to work out how to get the lowest noise and sharpest shots expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Coming from a background of DSLR,s I had something to compare this to. Although not comparable to a DSLR in terms of speed or Image quality, I was very suprised at how good this camera is . Having a shot at 2KM using the zoom I had a similar shot from my 5DMK2 and I could not pick the difference. For still shots the HX100V produces superb colour and detail. The only problem is the slowness when shooting a burst it take ages to clear the buffer before you can shoot again,other than that this is a little beauty that will give plenty of fun and replace a lot of the heavy gear you have been lugging around for years.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: This camera is just what I wanted
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything!
Cons: Nothing
This new Sony (& I am a Sony snob) on paper looked so awesome that I watched the Best Buy website & stores for 3 weeks until it was in stock. It was finally available 5 days before I took a vacation to NYC (my hometown). The ease of operation & special features like landscape photos was amazing.The zoom was beyond my expectations , especially at the baseball games we attended. This was everything I thought & hoped it would be. I love it & highly recommend it.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Received this camera a few weeks ago. Excellent picture quality and clarity (comparable to most entry-level and some mid-range DSLRs, but make sure you use the manual mode). I found that the pictures taken with the iAuto mode came out a bit darker than standard Auto mode overall. Like the other reviewer said you can't set EV in manual mode.
This camera has great anti-blur ability. Shooting flying birds using 30x zoom is a fairly easy task with this camera. You can get pretty clear pictures in low light conditions w/o flash (like in a aquarium).
Panorama mode is very fun, but the successful rate (for me) is average. You will need some practice for getting it every time.
Pro: Excellent camera for the price ($399 when I got it). Extremely well equipped, fun camera for ... beginners and semi-professionals. A fantastic camcorder as well.
Con: HDR mode isn't that HDR, Battery life is ok for taking pictures (can get around 300 pics w/o flash), not going to be enough if you plan to use it for videos (only about 90min for pure full HD filming) expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy toi us
Cons: LCD is not protected
Camera works very well, great pictures. I wish the LCD closed in and was not always exposed. Other then that, great camera for the price.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Almost what I think a SLR would be like .
Item.Review:
Pros: 30x zoom and steady shot
Cons: Like everything
Great shopping experience for ordering online, picking up at store.
Takes great pictures. Trying to learn more about manual modes. Having trouble with shutter speeds.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Best super zoom in the market
Item.Review: I bought this few weeks ago from B&H. I have experience with many digital point and shoot cameras and DSLRs. Sony HX100V has a outstanding image quality. I only use this for still photos but there are no other still cameras in the market that can beat HX100V in video quality. This is the best P&S in the market and it can beat some entry level DSLRs too.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Be unique- use the DSC-HX100V as a 51X super-zoooom telephoto. All you need is the Sony VCL-DH1757 1.7X lense that was made for the older HX1. Take PVC pipes and cut portions to create a slide-over holder for the lense. You will get amazing still and video shots of items miles away, including wildlife.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Picture quality, panoramic mode, picture burst mode
Cons: Haven't found anything yet
I have NO complaints about this camera. It works great in multiple lighting situations and the Intelligent mode is absolutely awesome. We upgraded from a similiar Canon model and it was a great decision! I haven't had any issues and just came back from a vacation taking a ton of pictures. The panoramic mode is very cool and I was impressed with the video function.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: The Sony DSC HX100V Digital Camera (Black) lens zooms In great and the color redition on the subject matter is great. Overall, the digital camera is a fantastic camera! I would this digital camera to anyone because its small enough and compact for everyday use!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Great super-zoom. Very fast camera - It has the fastest auto-focus of any camera i've ever owned, although it does slow down in low-light. The optical stabilization is also the best i have seen in a camera of this class. Image quality is great for my needs, though the agressive NR can visible at larger (1500px+) resolutions (though you can control this in the settings, the noise is just as bad as the softness caused by the NR - A drawback of the sensor size/MP ratio). I switch between audio and video a lot so this camera seemed perfect for me. Video quality is great for the most part. I cannot fault the highest quality setting at all, though it would have been great to have an option to switch to 30fps rather than 60 at the highest quality. Overall, this is a fantastic camera.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I purchased this camera on the recommendation of a friend. It is extremely easy to use and the clarity of the pictures is incredible. There are many features that I haven't used yet but I can't wait to try them out.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again
Item.Review: I will use this camera for most of my picture taking from now on. Even though I have a dslr this camera has it all. I am very pleased with the ease of use & the beautiful images it produces

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I bought this camera to take pictures of my family and I am amazed with the overall quality of the pictures. Great camera, has all the necessary bells and whistles less the cost and perfect for normal family use.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Wish I had this camera sooner!
Item.Review:
Pros: Great photos and videos, easy to use
Cons: absolutely nothing
After doing quite a bit of research on cameras, I kept being drawn back to this one. So, after losing my old camera at an ice arena, I bit the bullet and purchased it. I am so glad I did. The pictures I take of my two girls (5 and 22 months) are amazing! My old Canon Powershot does not hold a candle to this one! I was very impressed by the ease of use as well. I only wish I had this when my youngest was a baby....I have so many really poor quality photos from my Canon, it would have been nice to have this sooner to have the awesome photos I can take now. And the HD video is amazing!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: my husband bought this as my wedding present, but I had researched it for about 4 months before he bought it. I needed to replace my other sony cybershot that was rather slow. the camera has great quality pictures and I LOVE to PLAY with it. we went on a cruise for our honeymoon and I was very thankful to have it. My absolute favorite picture is one i took at night of my outside christmas decorations and you can see everything clearly. I am no professional so i do have trouble finding the best setting to take pictures on but using the in camara guide helps a lot.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Still Learning to use the features!
Item.Review: I usually shoot with a Nikon D90 but ordered this Sony Cyber-shot for a trip to Europe this summer. Purchased because of the super zoom which works really great - and, the lightness of the entire camera. Much less bulky than the Nikon and extra lens. It makes great photos, but it's not my Nikon. It processes a little slower making me miss a few shots of the birds and wildlife - but, for the purpose I bought it - I think it will work out well. The ultimate decision is still out since I have only had it a couple of weeks. I'm still learning the features - only cons thus far is the slow processing and the pictures appear a little on the red side - which can be fixed with editing software but wish they were not so red - maybe a better review after I have used it more. . . .

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good price for the quality
Cons: Wish they made a point and shoot camera this good
I just bought this a month ago after a LOT of research and i'm very satisfied with my decision. It's really easy to use, has a lot of neat features and i love that the user guide is installed in the camera so you don't have to look for the hard copy user guide manuals when you need to refer to something. I also think the size of the camera is pretty decent, i would say at least half of an SLR, which is great because the quality is still of an SLR, if not better. My friend owns an SLR and we did an outdoor photo shoot and compared our pictures, and honestly my pictures came out better! the zoom is awesome on this thing. I recommend this to everyone! :)

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Just came back from a trip to Italy, Spain and France where I took over 3,000 photos. The HX100V performed superbly under varying conditions. It is a very reliable low light camera; interior shots of some darkened cathedrals turned out beautifully. The super zoom worked as advertised -- excellent range, sharp, clear photos and remarkable technology that compensated for an occasionally unsteady hand. The panorama feature is a little bit temperamental but that might very well be result of user error. The panoramas, themselves, are amazing. Best of all, while other tourists were weighted down by and fumbling with the lenses for their digital SLRs, I was able to travel light and still achieve more than satisfying results.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: the quality of videos
I own the Sony DSC-H50 - 9.1 great camera but I was going on a missions trip and I wanted to upgrade to a higher pixel camera. I bought the DSC-HX100V 16.2 meg, I love Sony products and I love this camera. The picture quality is absolutely beautiful and the video quality is amazing. The videos look like they were taken with a camcorder. This camera is an excellent buy.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Picture quality
Cons: Nothing
We bought this camera as a wedding gift for ourselves and love it. The pictures are exceptional and the array of settings is great.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I am an amature photographer and I have several cameras from point & shoot as well as DSLRs. I found that the Sony products are well made and take excellent photos.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: This camera is the next step after using good compact cameras. I love the i+ mode, the great zoom and the speedy shot. For sure I need more time to explore all possibilities this camera offers.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: So easy to use!
I absolutely LOVE my new camera! Every picture that I have taken has come out so clear! I use the burst feature to capture my children's activities and I am so glad that I spend a few extra bucks on this camera. I would recommend it to anyone looking to take amazing pictures.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great functionality
I have been pining after my old Canon AE-1 for year, so it is about time I purchased something better than a flat, point-and-shoot model that moves every time I press the shutter button! Rather than purchase a DSLR and restart the lens accumulation addiction, I looked at several "bridge" cameras before deciding on the HX100. Mind you, I had my mind made up on a comparable Canon model, but a knowledgeable salesperson at Best Buy pointed this beauty out to me; instant LOVE!
I am still sorting out all the features, and am having great fun along the way. This is a terrific camera!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Nice step up from beginner stage
Item.Review:
Pros: ease of use, zoom feature
Cons: no internal memory
After comparing several camera features and prices, I am pleased with the choice of the Sony CyberShot. The ease of learning to use the camera and the abudance of features are well worth the price paid for the camera.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I was unable to find the camera locally and I am very happy that I didnt give up the search and get something else. I absolutely love this camera! I havent had it very long, but I have used it for my granddaughter's graduation and for pics while traveling. I also used the video which was so easy to do. I love the in camera guide also. I am very happy with this camera.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: sharp, clear pictures even in low light
Cons: Not easy to figure out the features and manual has to be downloaded
I love this phone and the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was the fact that it doesn't come with a very good 'cheat sheet' manual. I just need a manual with very basic features and anything advanced I can look up. I also can't seem to figure out how to get unlimited burst speed instead of the 10 shot limitation, although it is a very cool feature, especially the tilt view where you tilt the view screen to see your burst shots in action. I did get a good idea of low light and zooming capabilities at my daughter's dance recital where I couldn't use flash. I purposely sat a bit back in the theater so I could try out the zoom in the low light. Both worked w ... ell and my pictures were extremely sharp and clear, even without flash. So far I'm extremely happy with this camera and can't wait to take action shots at my cousin's wedding. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I purchased this camera to replace my much loved Sony DSC-F828. I love the zoom, the quality of the video in low light and the Program mode which allows me to force the flash while everything else is auto. I'm still trying to get used to the zoom and the shutter being on the same button. No filter threads so I have ordered an adapter.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: A lot of features, picture quality, zoom.
Cons: after you use continuous shooting it takes 2 or 3 seconds to save the pictures
This is an excellent camera for people who want to take great pictures and do not have a professional skill. This camera has a lot of features, picture quality is really good. the zoom is amazing. I'm a soccer fan and my son plays a lot. I have taken a lot of beautiful pictures when he is in motion. The only thing I noticed that could be improved is that after you use continuous shooting it takes 2 or 3 seconds to save the pictures, it could be a big issue because you can loose some good plays. Finally, when I was making the decision between this camera and a DSLR, I thought: this camera will provide more quality in my pictures than a D ... SLR based on my weak skill as a photographer. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: After reading a review posted on 6/17/11 by a reviewer, I decided to input my own opinion on this camera. One solution to get rid of Auto Preview is after taking the picture, during the display after shooting period, you can over ride the display time by pressing the shutter button half way down. When you do this, the camera returns to the live view mode almost immediately. So you won't miss taking picture.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I have an old slr Nikon D70 and a compact point and shoot. I Travel a lot and i needed a good one withouht the problem of carying all my lens and my point and shoot miss many focal ranges. I have my HX100V since last week, and i am realy happy with it. And the 1080p is fantastic. I have to learn how to use it in low light condition, but it exceed my expectations.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: In my opinion the worst categorie of cameras has always been bridge. Compact cameras reached a very good level of quality and the pocket size is fantastic. Bridges are as big as a DSLR and usually the only good thing is the great zoom, noise and low IQ were the rule. This year I owned the Canon SX30, the Fuji HS20, Nikon P500 and for the past 3 days the new Sony HX100. All of them are very good, but the Sony is outstanding, the IQ is very impressive, movies are great, Image stablilization almost perfect, low light very good, pictures are crisp and clear. I miss the high speed video and the LCD of the P500, but it can take better long range pictures than my Nikon D5000 + 70-300 Vr. The only thing I hate is the charger , it's the size of those notebook chargers and you must connect it to ... the camera, so buy a wall charger. This one I'm keeping. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great camera. So happy with my new pics.
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Large Clear LCD; Good in Low Light; Nice Body Color; Easy To Use; Small / Compact; Good Image Stabilization; Short Lag Time; Great Zoom; Fast/accurate auto-focus
Great camera. Great pic. Happy with my new views of Biscayne Bay and ships seiling Miami.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Review of DSC-Hx100V compare to Older's
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Stabilization; Large Clear LCD; Good in Low Light; Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Great Zoom
This is a change made to DSC-H9 on which have few experiences on high speed shoots and need a change. So I look for a faster shooter and found on the same budget range than my previous buy this one. Considered to be great in speed compared to other digitals without being an SLR you will feel like. I don't have any longer to control the flash so you will have only automatic and no flash, which I consider a reverse, but their intelligent mode looks like works at least in my first shoots. Thank you.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Good in Low Light; Large Clear LCD; Small / Compact; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Great Zoom; Good Image Stabilization; Good Image Quality
Most of my photos are of outdoor content. I have taken some panoramic photos but have not mastered it yet.Most all the photos come out crisp and with excelent resolution.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Zoom; Easy to Use; Great Resolution
Cons: Have not experienced any
I realy like the 30X zoom. Image come out crystal clear even with the zoom fully extended.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again and again
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Image Quality; Easy To Use; Small / Compact; Great Zoom; Good Image Stabilization; Fast/accurate auto-focus; Large Clear LCD; Good in Low Light; Nice Body Color
I use this camera for landscape, portraits, sports, and video. This camera is easy to use and light weight.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I really liked this camera, very light to carry around. The pictures that I took is like taken by a professional photographer. This is the best and I wouldn't trade to any brand out there. Besides this is Made in Japan. Some cameras are made in China or Indonesia. I don't like them because they are made so cheap....I am very happy to have this camera. Now I am ready for summer travel..Yahoooo...

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality of pictures!
Cons: Have to buy a card....camera's don't come with anymore.
I purchased this as a replacement camera for a Olympus. I had read all the reviews here and went to my local Best Buy~ saw this in their ad. The pictures are wonderful and I'm sure I'll get better once I take the time to figure it all out! My very first week with it I posted a few items on a sale site and had a person want to know what camera I was using because the quality of pictures were so good! Camera has great directions right on it! Picture of cardinal was one of the very first pictures I took on this camera and I was inside my house!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: 10/sec burst mode, blur background, zoom
Cons: Recovery time
I purchased this camera to capture my children’s sports activities. The 10/sec burst works great, but recovery time is awful. Come to find out that it is a common problem for all cameras including DSLRs. Every features described are easy to get to and works well.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great travel camera for this gal!
Item.Review: I bought this camera the day I was leaving for a long holiday without knowing too much about it and I don't regret it at all. The guys at B&H photo did not steer me wrong at all and were definitely super helpful in every aspect. I am all smiles about my Sony camera!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: everything
Cons: little expensive (but bought it on sale)
This is a great overall camera. I got tired of carrying an extra lens around. With the great zoom on this camera I don't have to.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Zoom
Cons: Complex!
Fun camera to learn. Lots of interesting and cool features. I'm an avid nature photog, so the super zoom hooked me. The panaroma feature is neat, as are the in camera zoom and smile detect. Still learning the ins and outs of the thing. Keeping me interested and improving my skills.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again and again
Item.Review:
Pros: Large Clear LCD; Fast Shutter Speed; Good in Low Light; Great Zoom; Great Resolution; Good Battery Life
Absolutely love the 30x zoom; the lens view finder and actually everything about this camera. Had another Sony before this one that I bought 4 years ago and I loved that one but it only had a 14x zoom. I buy Extreme 111 pro duo media cards and they are much faster than regular ones. Also love the long battery life on this.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use, good price, image quality and battery life
Cons: no regrets
Great camera to whom intents to begin to learn how to take photos, ease to use, good price, good supportive features, good quality of pictures and fast reponse on action.
Regarding the Best Buy support, one of the best company I have ever bought from. Reached the deadlines and supported me when I need.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Small / Compact; Good Battery Life; Fast Shutter Speed; Large Clear LCD; Great Zoom; Great little camera; Great Resolution; Good in Low Light
I use this camera for wildlife pictures and pictures at family gatherings. Also like to take pictures of old building that have some Architectural interest, flowers and interesting shapes in nature. Whats great about the camera is its flexibility.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I've been using Canon Medium Format cameras for years. The DSC-HX100V requires a complete re-learning process regarding its features. A PRINTED user guide would have been nice. So far, I'm shooting in idiot mode, and results are satisfactory. I would not say that this camera is user friendly/

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: GOOD IN LOW LIGHT,I USE THE ANTI-BLUR SETTING ALOT,MUCH FASTER THAN MY CANNON POWERSHOT 35X ZOOM ,AND IT DOES'NT RETRACT ALL THE TIME TRYING TO FOCUS IN ON YOUR SUBJECT,THAT DROVE ME CRAZY! LIKE THE HDR SETTING,SO FAR,SOO HAPPY!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Takes great pictures
Cons: Buttons different from previous model makes it a little confusing
This is the newer version of the camera I loved before (but broke). I wish that they had not changed the locales of some of the buttons, but otherwise it is terrific.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Very easy to use
Cons: Hard to see the screen when in full sunlight
I am very happy with this purchase. After looking at similar cameras, we decided on this one

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX100V 16.2 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I really love this camera. It takes great pictures. The 30x zoom is fantastic. The zoom is the most important to me. I take a lot of nature pictures. It is easy to use especially since my last camera was a s Sony.
